revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Text: add number tags in l. 4; remove space after <κατα> in l. 5; use |subst| tags in l. 7; in l. 7 >> εὔνους; add scribal apostrophe in l. 10; I’d regularize in l. 6 and 11 instead of using braces; in l. 13 >> μέρη τοῦ; add number tags in line 16; use double brackets around the letters in ll. 16-17 that have overdots; add (?) to G&H supplement in l. 17; I prefer |subst| tags in l. 18; add scribal apostrophe in l. 18; regularize in l. 19; use |subst| tags in l. 22; add number tags in l. 22; in l. 23 >> ορθ̣η; dot first sigma in l. 32; accent γὰρ in l. 33; add second diairesis in l. 33; in l. 34 >> ἐπίκοιν[ον; regularize in l. 35 and add number tags; use |subst| tags in l. 36. Add commentary that the siglum in l. 34 is best approximated by the Unicode point ≃. META: 95070 is a principal edition; MP3 is 02142.000

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Text: add number tags in l. 4; remove space after <κατα> in l. 5; use |subst| tags in l. 7; in l. 7 >> εὔνους; add scribal apostrophe in l. 10; I’d regularize in l. 6 and 11 instead of using braces; in l. 13 >> μέρη τοῦ; add number tags in line 16; use double brackets around the letters in ll. 16-17 that have overdots; add (?) to G&H supplement in l. 17; I prefer |subst| tags in l. 18; add scribal apostrophe in l. 18; regularize in l. 19; use |subst| tags in l. 22; add number tags in l. 22; in l. 23 >> ορθ̣η; dot first sigma in l. 32; accent γὰρ in l. 33; add second diairesis in l. 33; in l. 34 >> ἐπίκοιν[ον; regularize in l. 35 and add number tags; use |subst| tags in l. 36. Add commentary that the siglum in l. 34 is best approximated by the Unicode point ≃. META: 95070 is a principal edition; MP3 is 02142.000

bibl.title: The Grammatical Papyri from Graeco-Roman Egypt. Contributions to the Study of the "Ars grammatica" in Antiquity. Avec résumé en néerlandais.
